thread.title: Horse Racing: Meadowlands cancels live racing for Friday and Saturday - Sports
thread.title_full: Horse Racing: Meadowlands cancels live racing for Friday and Saturday - Sports - NorthJersey.com

author: The Record
title: Horse Racing: Meadowlands cancels live racing for Friday and Saturday - Sports
text:
EAST RUTHERFORD - With rain throughout Thursday night and the expectation of continued inclement weather, the Meadowlands Racetrack has canceled live racing for Friday and Saturday.
The all-turf meet kicked off Thursday night.  A Pick 6 carryover of $3,289 will await the next live date, Thursday, Oct. 8.
The meet runs through Oct. 31 with live racing Thursday through Saturday next week.  That will be followed by a Columbus Day card on Monday, Oct. 12 , and then Friday and Saturday racing through meets end. 
Post time is 7 p.m. nightly, except Columbus Day, when post time will be 2:15 p.m. and Friday, Oct. 30 , and Saturday, Oct. 31, Breedersâ€™ Cup days, when post time will be 12:30 p.m.
